{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Vodafone |model=DSL-EasyBox 802 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=ARV752DPW |pcb_id=141752C20001J |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 50702;XWAY DANUBE, PSB 50702 E, V1.3; |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=PSC |ram1_model=A3S12D40ETP-G6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306G |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} "P/N: 141752C20001J REV: 01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] ARV752DPW (ARV752DPW-B-LF-IR) This is the same board ID as the [[Vodafone DSL-EasyBox 602]].
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv752dpw On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.arcor-user-forum.de/dsl-easybox-802-gehaeuse-geoeffnet-hardware-photos-2758/ ''Images from a DSL-EasyBox 802''] *[ftp://ftp.dd-wrt.com/betas/2018/08-14-2018-r36596/vodafone_easybox_802/ '''DD-WRT''' firmware downloads]
